common.title: NOVA Apparel OEM Factory - Small Batch Apparel Customization
common.description: NOVA Apparel OEM Factory, specializing in small batch apparel OEM, minimum 100 pieces, serving Taiwan, Thailand, Malaysia customers, providing professional pattern making and OEM services, reliable quality, on-time delivery

hero.title: NOVA Apparel OEM, minimum 100 pieces
hero.subtitle: Focus on clothing customization in Taiwan, Thailand, Malaysia and other regions, provide professional pattern making and OEM services, reliable quality, on-time delivery

advantage1.title: Small MOQ
advantage1.desc: Support minimum 100 pieces, meet small batch customization needs

advantage2.title: Professional Pattern Making
advantage2.desc: More than 5 years of pattern making experience, accurately meet customer needs

advantage3.title: On-time Delivery
advantage3.desc: Cooperate with formal factories to ensure on-time delivery

trust.title: Trust Endorsement
trust.sampleDesc: Show our pattern making quality, detailed processing, precise pattern

review1.name: Ahmad - Indonesia Customer
review1.text: The casual wear customization meets our needs perfectly. Comfortable fabric, great fit, customers love it. We've already reordered.

review2.name: Mr. Chen - Taiwan Customer
review2.text: The pattern making for 480 professional suits was very accurate, on-time delivery, perfect fit. We will continue to cooperate.

review3.name: Sara - Thailand Customer
review3.text: The retro clothing pattern exceeded expectations, excellent color reproduction, perfect for our market. We've reordered.

review4.name: Mohamed - Malaysia Customer
review4.text: The Muslim clothing design perfectly meets our requirements, excellent attention to detail, smooth cooperation, on-time delivery.

review5.name: Mr. Li - Hong Kong Customer
review5.text: The 420 business suits we ordered fit perfectly, employees are very satisfied, on-time delivery, pleasant cooperation.

review6.name: Nguyen - Vietnam Customer
review6.text: The traditional clothing customization meets our cultural needs, excellent details, great quality, will cooperate again.

review7.name: William - Singapore Customer
review7.text: Excellent uniform quality, breathable fabric, employees are satisfied. Already recommended to partners.

review8.name: Maria - Philippines Customer
review8.text: Summer dress pattern is excellent, stylish design, lightweight fabric, perfect for tropical climate.

case1.title: Indonesia Casual Wear Customization
case1.desc: 350 pieces of casual wear customization, comfortable and breathable, suitable for local climate, suitable for daily wear
case1.feedback: Lead time: 12 days | Customer feedback: The casual wear is highly comfortable and suitable for the local climate, so we have placed a repeat order

case2.title: Taiwan Professional Clothing Customization
case2.desc: 480 pieces of custom professional apparel manufacturing, precise pattern, on-time delivery
case2.feedback: Delivery time: 14 days | Customer feedback: The pattern fits our needs well, and the employees are all satisfied

case3.title: Thailand Retro Dress Customization
case3.desc: 520 pieces of retro dress customization, high color restoration, suitable for local market
case3.feedback: Delivery time: 10 days | Customer feedback: The retro style is very popular with our customers, we have reordered

case4.title: Malaysia Muslim Clothing Customization
case4.desc: 280 pieces of Muslim clothing customization, detailed processing, meet local needs
case4.feedback: Delivery time: 15 days | Customer feedback: The details are handled very well, meeting our religious requirements

case5.title: Singapore Business Attire Customization
case5.desc: 420 pieces of business attire customization, precise pattern, suitable for business occasions, on-time delivery
case5.feedback: Delivery time: 11 days | Customer feedback: The business pattern is very professional, meeting our business needs

case6.title: Vietnam Traditional Ao Dai Customization
case6.desc: 380 pieces of traditional Vietnamese Ao Dai manufacturing, restore traditional style, detailed processing, meet local culture
case6.feedback: Delivery time: 12 days | Customer feedback: The traditional style restoration is very high, very popular with local customers

about.title: About Us
about.teamDesc: NOVA Apparel Factory has over 5 years of specialized experience in clothing pattern making and sample development, focusing on clothing OEM production, familiar with apparel style requirements in different regions, and can accurately restore customer design requirements.
about.coopDesc: We cooperate deeply with formal clothing factories, which can ensure that orders with a minimum of 100 pieces are delivered on time, the quality meets customer requirements, and there is no need to worry about production and delivery issues.

step1.title: Demand Communication
step1.desc: Communicate customization needs with customers, determine style, quantity, requirements

step2.title: Pattern Making Confirmation
step2.desc: Make pattern samples, confirm version and quality with customers

step3.title: Production Follow-up
step3.desc: Follow up production progress to ensure orders are produced on time

step4.title: Logistics Delivery
step4.desc: After production is completed, arrange logistics delivery to customers
